page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: HOLY TRINITY PARISH CHURCH HOPE Holy Trinity is the centre of the religious life of the area.The building is set in a picturesque setting on the side of the A488 in Hope, with the brook bisecting the church yard. The vicar, who lives in Worthen,has the responsibility for Hope and 3 other local parishes.A Family service is held monthly,Holy communion and Morning Service on the other Sundays of the month. The children of the village are involved with a thriving Sunday School,which meets monthly,and a Choir.Both Sunday School and choir have an annual summer outing,they are usually fortunate enough to have a lovely day for theit expedition.The church is run by a P.C.C.who organise fund raising.
